0.text: Innate - Intent: Yasuo's  total critical strike chance is multiplied by 2.5 from all other sources, but his  critical strikes deal only 「 (57.5% +  31.5%) AD bonus physical damage. 」「 90% of the  critical damage champions usually have. 」 Additionally, every 1% critical strike chance in excess of 100% is converted into 0.4 bonus AD.

1.text: Innate - Resolve: Yasuo generates  Flow for every 59 / 52.5 / 46 (based on level) units he travels by any means. At「 100 stacks 」「 5900 / 5250 / 4600 (based on level) units traveled 」and upon taking damage from enemy  champions or  monsters, Yasuo consumes all  Flow to  shield himself for 115 − 525 (based on level) for up to 1 second.

4.origin: CAST TIME: 0.4 − 0.133 (BASED ON BONUS ATTACK SPEED)

5.origin: STATIC COOLDOWN: 4 − 1.33 (BASED ON BONUS ATTACK SPEED)

0.text: Active: Yasuo thrusts his sword in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies hit and applying  on-hit and  on-attack effects at 100% effectiveness to the first enemy hit. Steel Tempest can  critically strike for 「 (40% +  28%) AD bonus physical damage. 」「 80% of the  critical damage champions usually have. 」

1.text: If Steel Tempest hits an enemy with the thrust, Yasuo gains a Gathering Storm stack for 6 seconds, which refreshes upon receiving the second stack.

2.text: While Yasuo has two stacks of Gathering Storm, Steel Tempest consumes the stacks to instead unleash a whirlwind that travels in the target direction, dealing the same damage and  knocking up all enemies hit for 0.75 seconds, or 0.9 seconds in combination with  Sweeping Blade.

3.text: Steel Tempest's thrust is  interrupted if Yasuo is affected by  complete crowd control during the cast time but its  cooldown is reset to 0.1 seconds.

4.text: Casting Steel Tempest during  Sweeping Blade will instead affect enemies around Yasuo at the end of the dash, or doing so immediately at his landing location after  blinking while ending the dash prematurely. Casting  Sweeping Blade when Steel Tempest's remaining cooldown is less than 0.5 seconds resets this remaining cooldown to 0.If Yasuo becomes unable to cast abilities during the dash after buffering, Steel Tempest will not cast, but will still go on cooldown. (note)

0.text: Active: Yasuo creates a gust of wind that travels in the target direction over 0.25 seconds to form a wall in front of him. The wall slowly drifts forward another 50 units over 3.75 seconds, blocking all hostile non- turret  projectiles that attempt to pass through it.

1.text: The effect grants  sight in a small static area in front of the cast location.

0.text: Active: Yasuo  dashes a fixed distance in the direction of the target enemy, dealing them magic damage if they are in range upon arrival. Additionally, he becomes  ghosted for a few seconds.

1.text: Each Sweeping Blade cast increases the next dash's base damage by 25% for 5 seconds, stacking up to two times for a 50% increase.

2.text: Yasuo cannot target the same enemy more than once every few seconds.

3.text: Yasuo will be  knocked down by any  immobilizing crowd control during Sweeping Blade.

4.text: Last Breath can be cast during Sweeping Blade. If  Steel Tempest has been buffered,  Wind Wall may also be cast during it. (note)

0.text: Active: Yasuo  blinks to the other side of a  visible  airborne enemy champion nearest to the cursor, instantly generating maximum  Flow while resetting  Steel Tempest's stacks.

1.text: Upon arrival, he  knocks up the target and all  airborne enemy champions around them for 1 second,  revealing them and slashing them with his sword over the duration, dealing physical damage thereafter. Enemy champions around the target that become  airborne before the effects end will also be  knocked up for the remaining duration and dealt damage at its end.

2.text: For the next 15 seconds, Yasuo's  critical strikes gain  50% bonus-armor penetration.

3.text: If Yasuo would be placed inside a  turret's  attack range upon blinking, he will instead attempt to position himself outside it (does not apply to  Nexus Obelisk).

4.text: A nearby  airborne enemy champion is required to cast this ability.
